sourcesContent:
import {all, call} from 'redux-saga/effects'
import {shopSagas} from './shop/shop.sagas'
import {userSagas} from './user/user.sagas'
import {cartSagas} from './cart/cart.sagas'

export default function* rootSaga(){
    yield all([
        call(shopSagas),
        call(userSagas),
        call(cartSagas) 
    ])
}
